metadata.title: CVE-2019-12781 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Django 1.11 before 1.11.22, 2.1 before 2.1.10,and 2.2 before 2.2.3. An HTTP request is not redirected to HTTPS when theSECURE_PROXY_SSL_HEADER and SECURE_SSL_REDIRECT settings are used, and theproxy connects to Django via HTTPS. In other words,django.http.HttpRequest.scheme has incorrect behavior when a client usesHTTP.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12781` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 1:1.11.22-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.11.22-1').
